6 400.0

952

Help:
'R' = release joyButton
'Z' = stop camera
'T' = toggle targeting mode
'D' = fire double whammy shots
'V' = zoom in on target
'A' = toggle High Low aimed shots
'P' = place camera on coaster path
'B' = reset superBall position
'L' = toggles look around mode
'S' = step camera position
space = fire shots
